TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You trigger nightmares in the waking at forty paces, whether you want to or not.

I wish for a good Christmas Number 1 that's nothing to do with the X Factor.

Just a quick note, you didn't corrupt my dream. That's exactly what I wanted.
I wish you'd made a wish without needing to edit your post.

Granted. Your wish being granted is a form of editing, however.

I wish that words could fall out of sentences and become blocks that represented letters.

No.

I wish I had my own country and It was recognized by the United Nations.

Granted, but a bigger country invades yours, kills everyone, and takes your stuff.

I want a nuke launcher.

Granted. But no ammo for it.

I wish for a laser gun.

Granted. Your Death Star is blown up.

I wish KSP happened IRL.

Granted. A rocket falls on your head and blows you up.

I wish for a laser gun that I can hold in my hands.

Granted. It can only be held for a few seconds, before it latches on to your face and shoots a laser at it.

I wish the Saturn V wasn't discontinued in 1972, so the Apollo program could have continued.

Granted. They don't upgrade the Saturn V or Apollo spacecraft and are only able to go to equatorial lunar landing spots. The public looses intrest and forces NASA to be shut down by the government.

I wish the Space Shuttle was better than it was; wishing it was the 2STO two piggyback on a plane style.

Granted, but they need the Antonov 225 to carry it and the Russians/Ukrainians won't lend it over

I wish the Buran program was ongoing.

Granted, but it got budget cuts.

I wish that I could have Jebediah Kerman's job.

Granted. In Danny's space program.

I wish we had skyhooks.

Granted: The Australian rock band "Skyhooks" is active once again!

I wish fossil fuels would renew at the same rate they are being harvested.

Granted. Global warming runs rampant and extinguishes most life on Earth. GG.

I wish for high efficiency fusion power in small, affordable packages.

granted. but the neutron radiation causes you to become radioactive and die.

i wish for red iron crown to sleep forever.

Granted. He is the only person to be passed by by the terrible torments of the apocalypse.

I wish people would stop making doomsday predictions.

granted. doomsday comes out of nowhere and kills everyone.

i wish i was immortal.

That's just a bad idea in and on itself, so it needs no corruption.

I wish for a time machine.

Granted. Your PC gets replaced by a knackered old Time desktop with a broken CD drive and a malware-infested Windows 2000 install.

I wish for all the Apple fanboys to be rounded up and tied to a tree.

Granted. The tree in question is in your yard.

I wish there were no fanboys.

Expressing your creativity in public is punished by death now. One giant company does everything related to getting resources, manufacturing and marketing. No more fanboys.

I wish for some upgrades to my bakery.

Granted, but it burns down. Now it's a charcoal facotry (BU-DUM-TSS)

I wish I could see an asteroid get into orbit around Kerbin naturally. (Without using and ships, just does it on it's own)

Granted. Time warp is disabled so you need to watch the whole thing in real-time.

I wish I could introduce a pizza oven to my baked goods empire and make more money by delivering pizza while making tasty cake.

Granted. Then you crash the pizza delivery scooter and end up in hospital with twenty broken bones.

I wish I had some milk.
